Verses: 1 naan Dhukkaththudane Ungalidaththil Marupadiyum Varaadhapadikku Enakkulle Theermaaniththukkonden.
2 naan Ungalaith Thukkappaduththinaal, Ennaale Thukkamadaindhavaneyallaamal, Evan Ennai Sandhoshappaduththuvaan?

3 ennudaiya Sandhosham Ungalellaarukkum Santhoshamaayirukkumendru, Naan Ungalellaaraiyumpatri Nambikkaiyullavanaayirundhu, Naan Varumpodhu, Ennai Sandhoshappaduththavendiyavargalaal Naan Dhukkamadaiyaadhapadikku, Adhai Ungalukku Ezhudhinen.

4 andriyum Neengal Dhukkappadumpadikku Ezhudhaamal, Ungalmel Naan Vaiththa Anbin Migudhiyai Neengal Ariyumpadikke, Migundha Viyaagulamum Mana Idukkamum Adaindhavanaai Adhigak Kanneerode Ungalukku Ezhudhinen.
5 dhukkamundaakkinavan Enakkumaaththiramalla, Oruvaaru Ungalellaarukkum Dhukkamundaakkinaan; Naan Ungal Ellaarmelum Adhiga Baaransumaththaadhapadikku Idhai Sollugiren.
7 aadhalaal Avan Adhiga Dhukkaththil Amizhndhupogaadhapadikku, Neengal Avanukku Manniththu Aarudhalseyyavendum.
8 andhappadi, Ungal Anbai Avanukkuk Kaanbikkumpadi Ungalai Vendikkollugiren.
9 neengal Ellaavatrileyum Keezhppadindhirukkireergalo Endru Ungalai Sodhiththariyumpadi Ippadi Ezhudhinen,
10 evanukku Neengal Mannikkireergalo, Avanukku Naanum Mannikkiren; Melum Edhai Naan Manniththirukkireno, Adhai Ungalnimiththam Kiristhuvinudaiya Sannidhaanaththile Manniththirukkiren.
11 saaththaanaale Naam Mosampogaadhapadikku Appadi Seydhen; Avanudaiya Thandhirangal Namakkuth Theriyaadhavaigal Allave.
12 melum Naan Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikkumpadi Thurovaapattanaththil Vandhapodhu, Karththaraale Enakkuk Kadhavu Thirakkappattirukkaiyil,
13 naan En Sagodharanaagiya Theeththuvaik Kaanaadhadhinaale, En Aavikku Amaidhalillaadhirundhadhu. Aadhalaal Naan Avargalidaththil Anuppuviththukkondu, Makkedhoniyaa Naattukkup Purappattupponen.
14 kiristhuvukkul Eppozhudhum Engalai Vetrisirakkappanni, Ellaa Idangalileyum Engalaikkondu Avarai Arigira Arivin Vaasanaiyai Velippaduththugira Dhevanukku Sthoththiram.
15 iratchikkappadugiravargalukkulleyum, Kettuppogiravargalukkulleyum, Naangal Dhevanukkuk Kiristhuvin Narkandhamaayirukkirom.

16 kettuppogiravargalukkulle Maranaththirkedhuvaana Maranavaasanaiyaagavum, Ratchikkappadugiravargalukkulle Jeevanukkedhuvaana Jeevavaasanaiyaagavum Irukkirom. Ivaigalai Nadappikkiradharku Evan Thagudhiyaanavan?
17 anegaraippola, Naangal Dhevavasanaththaik Kalappaaip Pesaamal, Thuppuravaagavum, Dhevanaal Arulappattapiragaaramaagavum, Kiristhuvukkul Dhevasannidhiyil Pesugirom.
